
lib/reports directory includes all libraries required for JasperReports integration

JasperReports:
--------------

* jasperreports is a library used to generate reports in html, PDF, openDocument and many other formats

The libary is under LGPL licence and can be downloaded (only after free registration) from:

http://www.jasperforge.org/index.php

Do NOT edit jasperreports files by hand. They were edited using iReport free software from this web site:

http://jasperforge.org/sf/projects/ireport


JFreeChart:
-----------

* jfreechart is a library used by jasperreports to generate various graphical charts
* jcommon is a library used by jfreechart 

Both are under LGPL licence and can be downloaded from:

http://www.jfree.org/
